CENTER FOR BLOOD RESEARCH

 

800 HUNTINGTON AVENUE
08 Reson Barro BOSTON, MASSACHUSETTS 02115
Biooe Chowne Lawonsone (ott) 731-6870

December 9, 1977

RE: Grant #1162

Me, W.T. Hoyt
Executive Vice President

‘The Council for Tobacco Research-U.S.A., Inc.
110 Bast 59th Street

New York, New York 10022

Dear Mr. Hoyt:

In response to your letter dated December 1, 1977, we have filled
and herein return the "Notice of Research Project" sheet. A copy of
the signature sheet which certifies that we shall abide by the regula~
tions for experiments involving human subjects is also enclosed.

We are looking forward to working with the Council on the proposed

project.
‘Thank you.
Sincerely yours,
an C. Chao, M.D., Ph.D.
Senior Investigator
Fec:rar
Enclosure

50130208

summary: The Council for Tobacco Research-U.S.A., Inc. sent the letter on December 9, 1977. The letter was addressed to W.T. Hoyt, Executive Vice President of the Council. A copy of a signature sheet which certifies that we shall abide by the rules is also enclosed.
